title: DS 495 Special Topics: Data Science Tooling (Building Packages)
text:
Activity 1
Get into teams of 3 and work on the following definitions

What is data analytics?
What is data science?
What is data science tooling?

title: DS 495 Special Topics: Data Science Tooling (Building Packages)
text:
Activity 2
What are Python and R packages?

Explore Plotnine and their Github Repository to see how Python packages are structured
Explore ggplot2 and their Github Repository to see how R packages are structured

Questions

Where are the functions located in the package?
Where is the documentation?
How are their websites built?
